title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2013, and lastly roughly constant from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2013.
Max Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 53.8 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 29.9 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2000 to 2013.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2014.
